snippet: Police in Democratic Republic of Congo said on Friday they had arrested the leader of a separatist Christian cult in the capital Kinshasa following a two-week standoff in which least six of his supporters were killed....

headline.main: A Relative of Couscous Finds a Wider Fan Base
headline.print_headline: A Relative of Couscous Finds a Wider Fan Base

lead_paragraph: Police in Democratic Republic of Congo said on Friday they had arrested the leader of a separatist Christian cult in the capital Kinshasa following a two-week standoff in which least six of his supporters were killed.
